div.data-mendix-props: "widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.container1","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container1","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.layoutGrid2","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid2 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.layoutGrid2$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.layoutGrid2$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.staticImage2","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage2","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$Tata_group_overview_1.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}}]}},{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.layoutGrid2$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col align-self-center","content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"An Empire standing"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h6"}},{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"The TATA Group"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.text4","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text4","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Jamsetji Tata at the age of 29 set up a trading firm in 1868, which now has scaled up to be a global enterprise. TATA Group is headquartered in India, comprising 30 companies across 10 verticals. The group operates in more than 100 countries across 6 continents, with a mission to improve the quality of life in the communities it serves globally."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"listenTargets":[]

"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.container5","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container5","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.layoutGrid3","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid3 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.layoutGrid3$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.layoutGrid3$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col align-self-center","content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.text5","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text5","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Our manual"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.text6","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text6","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Tata Code of Conduct"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.text7","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text7","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Tata companies have carried the legacy of values and ideals for over 150 years. First formulated by Mr. Ratan Tata, the Tata Code of Conduct (TCOC) articulates the Group’s governance. The Code has made it possible to outline our commitment to each of the stakeholders, including the communities in which we operate."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.container9","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container9","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.actionButton1$visibility","widget":"ConditionalVisibilityWrapper","props":{"visible":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"function","name":"_hasSomeRole","parameters":[{"type":"literal","value":"ContentAdministrator"},{"type":"literal","value":"Anonymous"}]},"args":{}}},"contents":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.actionButton1","widget":"ActionButton","props":{"buttonId":"41.S.Tata.actionButton1","class":"mx-name-actionButton1 pull-right","renderType":"button","buttonClass":"btn-default","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Know More"},"args":{}}},"tooltip":{"$type":"TextProperty","value":""},"action":{"$type":"ActionProperty","action":{"type":"openPage","argMap":{},"config":{"name":"S/TCC.page.xml","location":"content","allowedRoles":["ContentAdministrator","Anonymous"]},"disabledDuringExecution":true},"abortOnServerValidation":true}}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}]}},{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.layoutGrid3$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"41.S.Tata.staticImage3","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage3","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$cod.png?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}}]}}]}}]}}],"ariaHidden":false}}],"listenTargets":[]
